fields.day1_exercises:
Main Workout:
Front Squats – 4x8
Deadlifts – 3x8
Dumbbell Snatches – 3x10
Battle Ropes – 3x30 sec

HIIT Finisher (5 rounds):
20 sec Sprint
10 sec Rest
fields.day2_exercises:
Main Workout:
Box Jumps – 4x12
Kettlebell Swings – 3x15
Burpees to Pull-ups – 3x10
Hanging Leg Raises – 3x12

Cardio:
30 min incline treadmill walk
fields.day3_exercises:
Perform 3 rounds with no rest:
Jump Rope – 2 min
Kettlebell Deadlifts – 3x12
Wall Balls – 3x15
Rowing Machine – 2 min
Sled Pushes – 30m
fields.notes:
Best For: Those who want an efficient fat-burning plan with high-intensity workouts.
Focus on explosive movements and minimal rest periods.
Maintain proper form despite high intensity.
Ensure adequate recovery between sessions.

fields.day1_exercises:
Main Workout:
Bench Press – 4x8
Chin-ups (Weighted if possible) – 3x6
Dips – 3x10
Face Pulls – 3x12

HIIT Finisher:
Jump Rope – 5x1 min
fields.day2_exercises:
Main Workout:
Deadlifts – 3x8
Bulgarian Split Squats – 3x10/leg
Jump Squats – 3x15
Ab Rollouts – 3x12

Cardio:
20 min stair climber
fields.day3_exercises:
Main Workout:
Kettlebell Swings – 3x20
Burpees to Box Jumps – 3x10
Sled Pushes – 3x30m
Jump Rope – 3x2 min

HIIT Finisher (4 rounds):
30 sec Sprint
30 sec Walk
fields.day4_exercises:
Main Workout:
Front Squats – 4x8
Pull-ups (Weighted) – 3x6
Dumbbell Snatches – 3x10
Plank Hold – 3x60 sec

Cardio:
Rowing Machine – 25 min
fields.notes:
Best For: Those who can handle frequent high-intensity training.
Focus on compound movements and metabolic conditioning.
Ensure proper recovery between sessions.
Maintain high intensity throughout workouts.

fields.day1_exercises:
Main Workout:
Incline Dumbbell Press – 4x8
Dumbbell Shoulder Press – 3x10
Dips – 3x10

HIIT Finisher:
Jump Rope – 5x1 min
fields.day2_exercises:
Main Workout:
Deadlifts – 3x8
Pull-ups (Weighted) – 3x6
Bent-over Rows – 3x10
Hanging Leg Raises – 3x12

Cardio:
30 min treadmill walk
fields.day3_exercises:
Main Workout:
Squats – 3x8
Romanian Deadlifts – 3x10
Jump Squats – 3x12

HIIT Finisher:
Sprint Intervals – 4x20 sec
fields.day4_exercises:
Battle Ropes – 3x30 sec
Burpees – 3x12
Rowing Machine – 2 min
Plank-to-Push-ups – 3x12
fields.day5_exercises: 40 min incline treadmill walk or cycling
fields.notes:
Best For: Those who want the ultimate mix of fat burning, muscle retention, and endurance.
Balance between strength and conditioning work.
Focus on intensity and proper form.
Ensure adequate recovery between sessions.

fields.day4_exercises:

fields.day5_exercises:

fields.day6_exercises:

Romanian Deadlifts – 3x10
Jump Squats – 3x12

HIIT Finisher:

fields.notes:
Best For: Athletes and bodybuilders aiming for maximum leanness.
High intensity and frequency requires proper recovery.
Focus on form despite high intensity.
Ensure adequate nutrition and rest between sessions.
